locale.name: exception.fighters.handler.username_not_found
locale.en: The Steemit username "[username]" was not found in the system.

locale.name: exception.fighters.handler.user_has_no_character_class
locale.en: The QUIQQER user "[username]" (#[userId]) cannot be used as a Steempunk AbstractFighter because he has no character class assigned.

locale.name: exception.fighters.handler.user_is_already_a_fighter
locale.en: The QUIQQER user "[username]" (#[userId]) cannot be converted to a Steempunk AbstractFighter because he already is one.

locale.name: cron.fightScheduledBattles.description
locale.en: Fights all for now scheduled battles.

locale.name: message.save.successfully
locale.en: STEEMPUNK-NET Interface has been successfully updated.

locale.name: message.own.battle.1
locale.en: Do you like hitting yourself? I'm sorry, but this is not supported here.

locale.name: message.own.battle.2
locale.en: You're very masochistic. It's not gonna work that way.

locale.name: message.own.battle.3
locale.en: Do you do that in your spare time, too? ... Let's not do that.

locale.name: message.battle.challenge.vibe.6
locale.en: With a slight grin on your face

locale.name: message.battle.challenge.adventurers.place1
locale.en: You are strolling through a dark alley.

locale.name: message.battle.challenge.adventurers.place2
locale.en: You are hanging out in the depths of Ground Zero.

locale.name: message.battle.challenge.adventurers.place3
locale.en: You are cruising through the maze of Ground Zero's skyscrapers.

locale.name: message.battle.challenge.adventurers.place4
locale.en: You are hanging out in one of Ground Zero's infamous gambling dens.

locale.name: message.battle.challenge.adventurers.place5
locale.en: You are waiting for a business partner in a secluded backyard in Ground Zero.

locale.name: message.battle.challenge.adventurers.place6
locale.en: You are going down to the lower storeys of Ground Zero in a shabby paternoster lift.

locale.name: message.battle.challenge.general.place1
locale.en: You have withdrawn into an opium den.

locale.name: message.battle.challenge.general.place2
locale.en: You are bored out of your mind in a shady bar.

locale.name: message.battle.challenge.general.place3
locale.en: You run into [defenderUsername] in a busy corridor.

locale.name: message.battle.challenge.general.place4
locale.en: You run into [defenderUsername] in a quiet corridor.

locale.name: message.battle.challenge.general.place5
locale.en: You run into [defenderUsername] in a quiet side street.

locale.name: message.battle.challenge.general.place6
locale.en: You run into [defenderUsername] in a busy main street.

locale.name: message.battle.challenge.general.place7
locale.en: You are sitting in an apartment entrance and observe your surroundings.

locale.name: message.battle.challenge.aristocrat.place1
locale.en: You are strolling through Skyground's well-kept upper storeys.

locale.name: message.battle.challenge.aristocrat.place2
locale.en: You are dandering through Skyground's dapper corridors.

locale.name: message.battle.challenge.aristocrat.place3
locale.en: You are walking along Skyground's elegant Boulevards.

locale.name: message.battle.challenge.aristocrat.place4
locale.en: You are unwinding in one of Skyground's upper-class reading clubs.

locale.name: message.battle.challenge.aristocrat.place5
locale.en: You are enjoying a fresh breeze on one of Skyground's sun decks.

locale.name: message.battle.challenge.aristocrat.place6
locale.en: You are going up to the higher storeys in a modern automatic lift.

locale.name: message.battle.challenge.d3
locale.en: and inform [defenderSalutation] that you are going to fight.

locale.name: message.battle.challenge.d4
locale.en: and announce that you are going to fight.

locale.name: message.battle.challenge.d5
locale.en: and announce that you are going to duel each other.

locale.name: message.battle.challenge.cd1
locale.en: you challenge [defenderUsername] to a duel via your STEEMPUNK-NET implant.

locale.name: message.battle.challenge.cd2
locale.en: you challenge [defenderUsername] to a fight via your STEEMPUNK-NET implant.

locale.name: message.battle.challenge.cd3
locale.en: you throw down the virtual gauntlet to [defenderUsername].

locale.name: message.battle.challenge.info1
locale.en: The fight automatically starts in two hours.

locale.name: message.battle.challenge.info2
locale.en: The duel automatically starts in two hours.

locale.name: message.battle.challenge.info3
locale.en: In two hours, you will start the duel in the Clockwork Arena.

locale.name: message.battle.challenge.info4
locale.en: In two hours, you will start to fight in the Clockwork Arena.

locale.name: message.battle.challenge.info5
locale.en: You have two hours time to prepare – then the duel starts.

locale.name: message.battle.challenge.info6
locale.en: You have two hours time to prepare – then the fight starts.

locale.name: message.battle.challenge.defender.a2
locale.en: You are being challenged to a fight in the Clockwork Arena by [attackerUsername]!

locale.name: message.battle.challenge.defender.a7
locale.en: [attackerUsername] visited you profile and challenged you to a fight!

locale.name: message.battle.challenge.defender.a8
locale.en: [attackerUsername] visited you profile and challenged you to a duel!

locale.name: message.battle.challenge.defender.a9
locale.en: [attackerUsername] has it in for you and challenged you!

locale.name: message.battle.challenge.defender.b2
locale.en: In 2 hours your duel will start automatically.

locale.name: message.battle.challenge.defender.c1
locale.en: Vote, comment or post on Steemit to increase your power.

locale.name: message.battle.challenge.defender.c2
locale.en: Be active on Steemit to prepare for your fight.

locale.name: message.battle.challenge.defender.c3
locale.en: Be active on Steemit to prepare for your duel.

locale.name: message.battle.challenge.defender.c4
locale.en: Surf on Steemit to find better items and be better prepared for the fight.

locale.name: message.battle.challenge.defender.c5
locale.en: Surf on Steemit to find better items and be better prepared for the duel.

locale.name: message.battle.winner.message.5
locale.en: You showed it to [loserUsername] in your fight!

locale.name: message.battle.winner.message.6
locale.en: You showed it to [loserUsername] in your duel!

locale.name: message.battle.winner.message.8
locale.en: [loserUsername] had to accept defeat against you.

locale.name: message.battle.winner.message.9
locale.en: You defeated [loserUsername] in your duel an won!

locale.name: message.battle.winner.message.10
locale.en: You defeated [loserUsername] in your fight an won!

locale.name: message.battle.winner.message.11
locale.en: Like two gunslingers from the old days, you're facing each other. [loserUsername]s hand twitches to the weapon, but your reflexes are faster. In a fraction of a second, you pulled, aimed and squeezed. Miserably [loserUsername] sinks together. You won!

locale.name: message.battle.loser.message.1
locale.en: You're tasting the bitter flavour of defeat. You lost to [winnerUsername]!

locale.name: message.battle.loser.message.2
locale.en: Sweat drips into your face, your lungs burn from exertion, and the metallic taste of blood spreads in your mouth. Defeated, you collapse. [winnerUsername] has finished you.

locale.name: message.battle.loser.message.3
locale.en: One shot hits you and pierces you like burning metal. Before you even know what happened, your legs give in underneath you and your eyes turn black. [winnerUsername] killed you in the duel.

locale.name: message.battle.loser.message.4
locale.en: You look around in a hurry. You lost track of your opponent. Suddenly one shot - and you collapse, struck down. [winnerUsername] caught you!

locale.name: message.battle.loser.message.5
locale.en: Panting you attack, but [winnerUsername] is faster than you. With a lightning-fast movement [winnerUsername] fires and hits you. You're breaking down!

locale.name: message.battle.loser.message.6
locale.en: You fought bravely, but [winnerUsername] was just smarter than you. Teeth grinding, you have to surrender.

locale.name: message.battle.loser.message.7
locale.en: You are badly wounded and have no chance against [winnerUsername]. With a face distorted by pain, you surrender.

locale.name: message.battle.loser.message.8
locale.en: You're bleeding from countless wounds. Your ears are rushing, and it's turning black in front of your eyes. The last thing you see is how [winnerUsername] victoriously raises his arms and lets the audience celebrate.

locale.name: message.battle.loser.message.8
locale.en: The audience cheers mockingly as you go down in the clockwork arena. I hope none of your friends will see you in this dark hour. You will not forgive this defeat by [winnerUsername].

locale.name: message.battle.loser.message.9
locale.en: The roar of the audience cheers on [winnerUsername] when you chased through the arena. A sudden pain twitches you as [winnerUsername] shot hits you. You crash into the sand, rumbling. You've lost!

locale.name: message.battle.loser.message.10
locale.en: You fall to the ground in front of [winnerUsername]s feet. In front of you: the bloody sand of the clockwork arena. In your nose: the smell of sulfur and gunpowder. In your ears: the mocking laughter of the audience. You failed!

locale.name: message.item.found.message.1
locale.en: Walking through the streets, you find [item].

locale.name: message.item.found.message.2
locale.en: Tiptoeing through the corridors, you find [item].

locale.name: message.item.found.message.3
locale.en: Wandering through the hallways, you find [item].

locale.name: message.item.found.message.4
locale.en: While exploring the city, you find [item].

locale.name: message.item.found.message.6
locale.en: You are now proud owner of [item].

locale.name: message.item.found.message.7
locale.en: Your bravery is rewarded! You receive [item].

locale.name: message.item.found.message.8
locale.en: Your bravery is rewarded! You find [item].

locale.name: message.item.found.message.9
locale.en: You find [item] and pocket your new possession inconspicuously.

locale.name: steempunk.item.2.title
locale.en: Ponzis Shotgun of the multiplied chastisement
